title: Library Request: Cbc
body:
[Cbc (Coin-or branch and cut)](https://github.com/coin-or/Cbc) is an open-source mixed integer linear programming solver written in C++. It can be used as a callable library or using a stand-alone executable. It can be used in a wide variety of ways through various modeling systems, packages, etc.

[pyomo](https://github.com/QuantConnect/Lean/issues/6980) uses this solver

```python
from pyomo.contrib import appsi
self.log(appsi.solvers.Cbc().available())
```

#### Checklist
- [x] I have completely filled out this template
- [x] I have confirmed that this issue exists on the current `master` branch
- [x] I have confirmed that this is not a duplicate issue by searching [issues](https://github.com/QuantConnect/Lean/issues)
- [x] I have provided detailed steps to reproduce the issue
